assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_For_DeNovo_Initial_Initiation_Criteria_Q7
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: e) Pre-eclampsia, HELLP syndrome, pregnancy-related TTP: provide pregnancy test results in all women of child bearing age a. If the patient is pregnant, a detailed explanation must be provided justifying why this is not TMA secondary to pregnancy
